website_summaries.verdict: This floating solar-powered cleaner is designed to reduce your need for chlorine.
pros: Does a good job of keeping the algae down
Really helps you reduce the need for chlorination
Many users find it is possible to go without chemicals and still have an algae-free pool
cons: This works with a copper diode and puts copper into your pool

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Going on 3 summers with this ionizer and I absolutely love this thing. It works so well, far exceeded my expectations. Im able to have my pool 100% chemical free for about 5months. Not enough sun to power it in the winter so I chlorinate. But man, when this thing is in use its amazing. its so great to swim in crystal clear freshwater with no chemicals all summer long. I constantly get conpliments. Relitvely easily to use for the average pool owner just by following the directions. Highly, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Sunk...Bought end of 2017. Sunk by early 2020.
customer_reviews.text: The unit does not float. It is currently at the bottom of my pool. Disappointing that it only lasted ~24 months... The site does not share warranty information. It says contact seller. I will update my review *IF* they warranty it. If you are reading this, they did not warranty product...
customer_reviews.author: Adam L. Way

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Crystal clear soft water. Minimal chlorine usage. Typically this pool use to turn green after a couple of rains. Have had since May and not green once. No acid or stop yellow needed. Husband loves minimal maintenance. Best pool product!!! 6/2019 update, still going strong. Wish we had this in our life years ago, little secret pool supply companies dont want you to know about. Everyone raves about our soft our water is. Cant say enough about this product May 2020 update: noticed pool was turning green. Copper had worn down to nothing. Bought the replacement kit and six weeks later crystal blue and silky smooth water.
customer_reviews.author: Tari C.

customer_reviews.title: Not Water Tight
customer_reviews.text: Water leaks inside of the unit causing it to sink. I have had it a little over the 30 day return period so I guess I'm stuck with it. Works great other than that. If you buy this take it out of the pool and shake it to see if it is seeping water inside of the cavity
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Best thing you could buy for your pool
customer_reviews.text: This is my second floatron. I had my original one for nearly 10 years and I bought this one to replace it. Its very very easy to assemble and use. It took less than 5 minutes to open the box and put it together. Then it is as easy as throwing the thing in your pool to float around. It comes with test strips to see how ionized the water is. If you're looking for a solution to use less chlorine then this is the move. 100% would recommend using one in your home pool.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Brewington

customer_reviews.title: Developed a leak, Floatron support great so far
customer_reviews.text: This is my second try with this type of product. A cheaper version purchased from Amazon lasted just 1 season. So I thought I would try the most expensive one. The concept does work, I've seen it work. Last season, water started to infiltrate the unit, but it was minimal, and has a 2 year warranty, so I didn't bother. Woke up today to find the unit at the bottom of the pool. I wrote the floatron company direct (since it is not linked here on amazon) and got an immediate response and are working out a remedy. Surprised at the quick reply, will update.
customer_reviews.author: Nsane1

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: My husband struggled to keep our pool clean and free of algae before we purchased this. He barely has to do anything anymore! I cannot express how terrific of a product this is. No more algae, no need for an over-abundance of chlorine, -- just perfect and worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: leb199

customer_reviews.title: Uncertain
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with this product and significantly lowered my chemical cost last summer. Must use as directed and I have 40,000gal in ground. I'm in South Carolina so our swim seasons are long, April-October. Unfortunately 2 months ago the film on top started to peal off of solar panel and it is not worker well and taking on water. Paying $250 is a pinch in any pocket but it saved me over $1000 in chemical and maintenance expense. I will look for different brand to purchase for this year.
customer_reviews.author: Rebgue

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised and easy to care for.
customer_reviews.text: Floatron is doing exactly what I purchased it for. It has kept my pool from turning green even though this spring and early summer has had many heavy rain storms filling up the pool. Normally this would require algaecide and shock but the unit has taken care of that issue completely. So I am happy so far. Cleaning of the anode every few days takes about 5 minutes tops.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love this Floatron!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this thing! Have used it all summer so far and after a month, I really didn't need hardly any chlorine in the pool. The pool water was clear and only very slight dead algae at the bottom. And I never run the filter much either. This thing is amazing. I was hoping it would be what most everyone said it was and it was! No more vacuuming the pool twice a week and the bottom of the pool turning green. Now more like once every two weeks...if that. And bottom doesn't turn green!!! Yay!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Floatron Ionizer Works!
customer_reviews.text: This product is effective at releasing copper ions into the swimming pool water. After just a few days with the unit in the pool the water appeared clearer and the algae was reduced. Over a period of a few weeks I allowed the chlorine to drop in the pool and there was no regrowth or any algae as a result. After just one week the electrode was crusted up with calcium deposits, so clean it often for best effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! It took a while to start working for us and I posted a question, we were getting frustrated and almost returned it. But after 6 weeks the pool was crystal blue clear. Chlorine tabs we use 1 every week to every other week. Definitely reduces the time, money and energy we spend on caring for and cleaning our pool. I've recommended it to all my friends that have pools.
customer_reviews.author: audrieann111

customer_reviews.title: NEVER BE WITHOUT IT
customer_reviews.text: Our old Floatron finally wore out at the beginning of this season (after 9 yrs) and I thought we really don't need it. BOY oh BOY was I wrong... I spent so much time and money in the 6 weeks without it. It is worth its weight in gold. I will never not have it again. I hope this one lasts as long as the last one. THANKS FLOATRON I'm a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: smichael

customer_reviews.title: It completely cured a bad algae problem that we had
customer_reviews.text: Just finished my second season using the Floatron. It completely cured a bad algae problem that we had. Now our pool is crystal clear and beautiful. Our pool guy is now telling his other customers about it. Our pool is 25,000 gallons. I will replace the copper element at the beginning of next year's pool season. Keep in mind that it is important to clean the electrode on a regular basis. I do it once a week, and actually enjoy doing it. I use a high pressure hose attachment; it take me 10 minutes tops to get it clean enough. (You'll also know it's working: you will see the green residue on the electrode.)
customer_reviews.author: David Inhofe

customer_reviews.title: unnecessary exposure to dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Just as so many other reviewers have already stated, I too wish I would have discovered the Floatron long before now! The money I will save on my electricity bill and chemical costs to just maintain our pool, by and far supersedes the cost to purchase a Floatron. More importantly though, owning one enables me to protect both myself and my family from additional, unnecessary exposure to dangerous, toxic chemicals. To those who may be reading my review: this product is a must have-if you're looking for an extremely low cost, virtually maintenance free pool.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Williams

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the claims for this device but since I put it in the pool (central Florida with a pool screen) it has delivered as promised. My water has never been this clear and I am using way less chlorine than I did in past summers. My pool water is over 90 degrees and previously it took lots of chlorine tabs to keep the algae at bay. Based on half a pool season it is working fine and I am glad that I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: DC in FLA

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been trying to get me to purchase 1 of these for years, but I was skeptical on how it could work. I finally broke down and bought one, literally the best purchase I've made in relations to the pool, does exactly what it claims. My pool stays crystal clear year around with very little chlorine and no chemicals. Made me a believer!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Defective. Bought in May, pool put in late June, assumed that it was working, tested pool in August and was told that our Floatron was not working. Looked online and performed test showing that it was not working. We would have returned sooner but did not realize that the unit was defective. Did we just waste $279.72? We are very happy with other items purchased and are interested in utilizing the cost savings of Amazon Prime more in the future but not if items are defective.
customer_reviews.author: Tex

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE MY FLOATRON
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my Floatron for 7 years now. I open my pool, balance my water then put the Floatron in and never have to add any more chemicals, other than shock after a hard rain or heavy usage of the pool. I also use chlorine tabs regularly. I have saved over 600 a year by using this product. So thankful my neighbor suggested I get one. Make sure to take your Floatron out while adding any chemical other than your chlorine tablets. After 24 hours, I put my Floatron back in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gant

customer_reviews.title: A nice product we thought it was going to last for ...
customer_reviews.text: A nice product we thought it was going to last for a long time, but in less than 3 years we had to go back to normal with regular amounts of chemicals to clean the pool. Also, it seems it stopped working for a while and we don't know why but water got leaked in the main disc. Maybe an upgrade for this product would get better. For now, I wouldn't buy a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Fernando Gommorin Duarte

customer_reviews.title: Short-term Solution with Heavy Price Tag
customer_reviews.text: We have a 15'x4' pool and struggled to keep it algae free this year. I ordered Floatron as a last resort. It worked great. However, the metal insert only lasted about 5-6 weeks. It also left a lot of scale from the insert in the pool water. I also continued using the same amount of chemicals as prior to the Floatron. For algae control--5 stars. For expense, longevity, and chemical reduction--1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Floatron customer Service is excellent
customer_reviews.text: My first floatron was great lasted several years. My new one I just got in June is filling with water and not floating properly. Not happy because they are pricey. 😩. Contacted Floatron, and they quickly replaced mine with a new one. Very impressed cause this is a product I totally love and see the results year after year!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Outlaw

customer_reviews.title: Every pool should have one.
customer_reviews.text: This has changed my life, and my bank balance. I have experimented by not putting chlorine in for a few months, and so long as I keep the anode clean (you do have to scrub the excess corrosion off maybe monthly, or bi-monthly) it keeps the water very clear with no chlorine in the off season, and minimal to no chlorine in (formerly) bad seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Teo

customer_reviews.title: Flotron makes keeping the pool clear so much easier!
customer_reviews.text: So far this has worked excellent. My water has cleared and I use less chemicals. Last one I purchased leaked within two months. So far so good on this one.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: and like the Energizer bunny
customer_reviews.text: I have had the FLOTRON for 5 years, and like the Energizer bunny, it keeps going , and going, and going...In five years I am now on 3rd copper cores (we live in the northeast so only use the pool 5 months out of the year). Our water is crystal clear and we use very little Bromine. Great device and well worth the investment. I have saved more on the Bromine than this device costed..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use 1 3inch chlorine tablet in the skimmer basket and a great pool vacuum and that's all I do
customer_reviews.text: It keeps the water sparkling clean. I have very little maintainance. I use 1 3inch chlorine tablet in the skimmer basket and a great pool vacuum and that's all I do. I've been using the Floatron for years since it first came out, I have never had to use algacide or liquid chlorine I am 77 and a widow raising 2 grandchildren who love the pool. The least I have to do to take care of it the better it is.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hodgkins

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Showed up cracked and broken, called the manufacturer they said it’s not their problem. Luckily Amazon refunded me. Don’t waste your money on this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Routson

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Although I was initially skeptical, this product has kept our pool clear of algae for around 3 summers so far. It requires zero chemicals and sero maintenance. I wish the rest of the pool was like it!
customer_reviews.author: Peter O.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: It did take the Floatron 2 weeks to clear our pool (15,000 gallons) but since then it has been awesome! We had to clean it every other day at first but now only once a week. We were having work done on our house and the man doing the gutters asked my husband how he kept the pool looking so good and wished his looked that good. I would recommend this to anyone. Do look at it every other day at first to be sure there is no build up. It cleans easily with the hose in about five minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Seriously impressed
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have high hopes for this product as it sounded too good to be true but I am thrilled to report I was wrong. I've has such trouble with my pool over the last year going green and murky every 3 weeks or so and having to put tons of shock in. No more, pool is amazing and I haven't even needed to out anymore chlorine in since I put the floatron in.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: AweOsome!!
customer_reviews.text: Plopped this little guy in my pool in South FL and it had made my life so easy. No more adding pounds of chlorine powder and the water clarity is greater than ever before. Why spend thousands on a salt water pool when you can just use this? Had it for about 5 months and the rod is about 60%.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This product does what it claims it is well worth the cost. With the money you save in not having to use a bunch of chemicals, it more than pays for its self.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Woods

customer_reviews.title: Clean carefully
customer_reviews.text: Had to order replacements in two months. Lots of money to have to do that
customer_reviews.author: Grandmom

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectation
customer_reviews.text: The floatron has exceeded our expectations. Only downfall is that it is hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ally's Momma

customer_reviews.title: It does everything that it claims!
customer_reviews.text: I tried it because every year I have algae. I live right next to a soy bean field. This year, absolutely NO algae, crystal clear water, I was able turn my pump on from dusk to dawn and not 24 hours/daily, and turn my frogger down from 9 to 6. This is definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: #lifechanger
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing since sliced bread! I've had a pool for 26 yrs. 4 years ago I was introduced to the wonders of the Floatron. It changed my life. Seriously it did. When my pool-owner friends tell me about their pool issues, I tell them about this baby. And they buy it and it changes their life too. Floatron should probably be giving me a commission for every unit I sell for them. Buy this thing! Follow the directions and your life will also be changed. Just do it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps pool clear!!
customer_reviews.text: Saves lots of money on pool chemicals. Pool is always crystal clear. Even when opened at first of year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the algae gone.
customer_reviews.text: We just use one 3 inch chlorine tablet a week. Before we got the Floatron we were using so many chemicals. No algae all summer.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Long

customer_reviews.title: This was an amazing change from the harsh chemical use.
customer_reviews.text: We have a small pool (12x25), but it would constantly turn green and needed MUCH chlorine. Once we purchased the Floatron, we went to scrubbing the pool every three days, to scrubbing the pool almost every two months. What a great find! In addition, my daughter and I both have sensitive skin. This was an amazing change from the harsh chemical use.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Sparkling Crystal Clear Pool
customer_reviews.text: The Floatron is amazing!!! I love it!! My pool is crystal clear! I use a weekly chlorine tablet and shock every 3 to 4 weeks!! I would highly recommend this Floatron, it is worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Doris Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Floatron Happyness
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how it work,s I don't know why it works , I just know ever since I started using it I have only used a cup of muriatic acid and turned my salt generator to it's lowest setting and my pool is crystal clear. I highly recommend this product if you have an algae problem.
customer_reviews.author: G. K. Courtney

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Seems to be doing what it said it would. Only a month in, but water is crystal clear. And the water WASN'T clear when I added it. So... hopefully this is partially attributed to this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Will save so much money in chemicals
customer_reviews.text: The floatron is an awesome investment for your pool. Not only are you using less chemicals, it is better for your health and your pool liner!
customer_reviews.author: Jill A. LaClair

customer_reviews.title: Floatron -- a BEST KEPT SECRET for pools
customer_reviews.text: At a friend's suggestion, we ordered a Floatron for our pool in Arizona, one of the hottest climates in the US. The results were amazing! Our water is crystal clear and our chlorine additions to the pool have been cut by 85%. Our water feature flowing into the pool even has birds bathing on it because the water is so pure. We love this product! Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Connie AZ Girl

customer_reviews.title: I didn't think this would work since we were getting ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think this would work since we were getting used to shocking the pool then drowning it in chlorine....and the next week having a green swamp anyway. Keep in mind near yosemite it is hot...Bought this as last resort and it works.... Still not sure how but we come back week after week and pool is crystal clear and we don't use that shock packets at all.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha J. Victory

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: Great product and handfree once its setup. Saved me tons of time and money from buying pool cleaning products
customer_reviews.author: TopanGa!

customer_reviews.title: Still in disbelief how well this works!
customer_reviews.text: What a difference this product is made in my pool! I have been fighting black algae, mustard algae and this year green algae . Following the purchase of this product, I have probably used only three or four chlorine tablets in my 40 x 15' pool over the course of the last six or seven weeks. The pool has never been this clean! It is a joy to wake up in the morning and look at the pool and see it sparkle in the sunlight! I am still in disbelief that this product works this well!
customer_reviews.author: Constance Pickard

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but it actually works! No muck or slime. I haven't shocked the pool or added any chemicals except on small chlorine tablet in the floater. I clean the unit once a week.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Don't Hesitate, it works
customer_reviews.text: It works! Pool is very clear even with the FL rain. Chemical levels stay good between weekly service.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M. Stronberg

customer_reviews.title: this thing is amazing! I have had mine for over 10 years ...
customer_reviews.text: this thing is amazing! I have had mine for over 10 years and just bought one for my brother. I never have to add algecide, my water is always clear. my chlorine use is minimal. It's a must have if you have a pool. I have recommended it to several people who have bought one and they all love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: Green pool now crystal clear after just TWO days!! I have spent hundreds and hundreds of dollars on chemicals for our algae infested pool and nothing has ever made the water as clear as it is now!!!
customer_reviews.author: whittle

customer_reviews.title: pool maintenence made simple
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 golden retrievers that love our pool, so constant maintenence was an understatement for our pool. I was able to keep the pool clear but I was spending a small fortune. I have had floatron for over 1 month now and all I have had to do for the last couple weeks is float a chlorine tablet. Thanks floatron
customer_reviews.author: Callie T

customer_reviews.title: Must be cleaned more than the recommended once a week
customer_reviews.text: Too soon to write a review. Must be cleaned more than the recommended once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hopper

customer_reviews.title: I'm in Love
customer_reviews.text: I put this and a solar floating pump in my pool about 6 weeks ago,,,,my pool has never looked better, and I spend virtually no time on chemicals. I haven't shocked my pool since I started the floatron, but still use 3" tablets....but I have never had my pool look this good and this easy to take care of...i highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Collins

customer_reviews.title: Can't give a higher rating as it is not working ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't give a higher rating as it is not working properly in my gunite pool. Could be that my pool is filled with well water. I'm trying to use it again this season.
customer_reviews.author: LJB

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how awesome this works! I only used chemicals to start up our pool this summer and that is IT!! I still use chlorine tablets in the skimmers only because we have little ones that come to swim so I know that they don't always get out to use the restroom :). It is an amazing product and I am so thankful someone recommended it to us!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Love the product but don't let the mineral rod get pencil thin
customer_reviews.text: Great product with good results and makes pool care easy, except don't let the rod get too thin. I let mine get too thin in some areas and the whole thing fell off, basket and all and stained the bottom of my pool. Replace rod when you see feel as though it may not be secure.
customer_reviews.author: S palm

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: It really does work! Make sure you clean it weekly. I left it for 3 weeks and went away for the weekend. Water was clear on Friday and Green on Monday. Cleaned this off, filtered out the crap - and it was clear again in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob R

customer_reviews.title: If you want crystal clear pool water with minimal maintenance ...
customer_reviews.text: If you want crystal clear pool water with minimal maintenance you should give this a try. We've been using a Floatron for about 15 years. This is only my second unit. The first lasted 14 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product that I knew nothing about till it was suggested to me
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Save Money & Use Less Chemicals
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased my second floatron - the first one lasted us 11 years! If you want sparkling clear water, lower costs and to use less chemicals this is the way to go. Be sure to follow the directions and stay away from the pool store as they will recommend a bunch of chemicals that you don't need.
customer_reviews.author: L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Use less chlorine.
customer_reviews.text: It took about 5 weeks to ionize the pool. when it did, the water cleared up and stayed clear through numerous swim parties and thunderstorms. Well worth the money. The first one we had lasted about 15 Years before succumbing to the boisterous boys slamming it around.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W. Jones

customer_reviews.title: It works!!! Nuff said!!!
customer_reviews.text: I live in so cal 🤨 I have had this thing for about 1 month. The water is 87° and algae is usually a pain in the well you know when the water gets that hot. Anyway it really does work. Not one lick of Algea so far. I am blown away. Also the kids don’t have green hair and they are in the pool every single day.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! I have cut back so much on chlorine ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I have cut back so much on chlorine and other chemicals in my pool. Water stays crystal clear. As a matter of fact have had my automatic chlorine feeding totally off. Once a week I add a pack of shock and that is it. We recently had a few days of good rain. I was forced to add some chlorine. I suggest getting some throw away rubber gloves. Just for cleaning the Floatron once a week. Only thing that I didn't like is the cheesy chain to anchor the Floatron in one spot. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Helmut Peiker

customer_reviews.title: Floatron
customer_reviews.text: The product seems to be working a wee bit than expected. Our pool contains 9000 gals and is very easy to keep clean using bleach products. We have had it afloat about a month now and it still isn't quite up to par with the test kit sample. We haven't added any bleach for about 2 weeks and the pool is very clear and clean.
customer_reviews.author: L. RIEL

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk! Turned my pool more green than what it already was. Took it out, pool is clearer now! Also says I can’t return it, awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be doing a fine job. I have a salt water pool with ...
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be doing a fine job. I have a salt water pool with a solar powered skimmer. The skimmer kept running over the Floatron so I tied it to the side of the pool and it solved the issue. If you like this product--you will LOVE the solar pool skimmer!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather M. Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Keeps pool perfect
customer_reviews.text: Conditions water and keeps algae out of pool. Best $250 I ever spent on my pool. Cut the chlorine consumption to 5 tabs once a week thru summer months and zero during winter time. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: patrick reznak

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me..
customer_reviews.text: Saw no positive effect from using this product. Maybe my pool was too big? I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Amitola Acres

customer_reviews.title: It works great to keep the pool clean and clear
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our pool. It works great to keep the pool clean and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Scott

customer_reviews.title: May need 2 if pool is over 21,000 gallons
customer_reviews.text: Like how these work. My pool is a little over 21,000 gallons. Seems I may need 2 of these to keep up.
customer_reviews.author: KTM

customer_reviews.title: So impressed....
customer_reviews.text: Within two weeks of starting, the levels are where they should be in my 10-13,000 gal pool and just by placing it in the shade I can leave it in the pool using indirect light. Chlorine down to < 1ppm and it looks as clear as drinking water. It's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: PScottBx

customer_reviews.title: This is an exceptional device. I have a 25000 ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptional device. I have a 25000 gal, vinyl lined pool and with the Floatron I rarely have a problem with algae. Generally, the only buildup is when there is an extended period of cloudiness or a lot of rain. This is my second Floatron (the first lasted 3 years before I dropped it and cracked the main body).
customer_reviews.author: Black Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it works great.
customer_reviews.text: Water keep getting in, had to drill a hole to drain it. Tried to glue but it keeps filling up. Other than that it works great.
customer_reviews.author: k boud

customer_reviews.title: Greatest thing I ever purchased for my pool
customer_reviews.text: Greatest thing I ever purchased for my pool. Thank you for a great product! You saved me mega money on chemicals and my pool has not had any algae this I put it in!
customer_reviews.author: dmb in tampa

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This works as advertised. I still have to use a small amount of Chlorine but, maybe 25% of what i used to use AND the water is clear. No more Shocking pool.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Snellback

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. I have had mine for about a month and the water is crystal clear. A friend told me about this product and I assure you it's worth every penny. I haven't had to shock my pool one time. Just throw some chlorine tabs in occasionally and you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a flotron for over 20 years. I would recommend anyone with a pool to try it. It definitely cuts down on chemical use and our water is always clear.
customer_reviews.author: P. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality built product works great looking forward for easy summer upkeep and savings on chlorine
customer_reviews.author: kgen

customer_reviews.title: the Item works great was shipped on time once the pool is stabilized ...
customer_reviews.text: the Item works great was shipped on time once the pool is stabilized it cut chemical cost by about half or more
customer_reviews.author: ridowdy

customer_reviews.title: Floatron Solar Powered Natural Pool Cleaner is a definite winner!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the Floatron Solar Powered Natural Pool Cleaner. It is performing at more than expectations and I would recommend it to anyone with a pool. I was a bit skeptical but I am definitely suitably impressed!!! I saw results within days.
customer_reviews.author: Liz from New Zealand

customer_reviews.title: Great devise but be patient
customer_reviews.text: Working great here in Miami (water temperature up to 90 degrees F in the pool). Pool size 9000 gallons, but you need to wait at least 2-3 month to start to reduce chemicals. Now after 10 month of use water is crystal clear practically without adding any chlorine. Just in case keeping 2 chlorine tablets in floating devise. Again - BE PATIENT.
customer_reviews.author: Leonid Loukachenets

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this... and it works. You can drop your chlorine levels down and keep your pool clean with very minimal maintenance. Well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: -jmg

customer_reviews.title: Floatron
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. You really forget about your pool. Practically no more clorine and no more red eyes. Also the taste of the water improves dramatically.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Made well
customer_reviews.text: Having previously had a competitors product it appears that this one is superior in design and construction. I look forward to a good lifetime of a clean pool. Super quick delivery to the far side of the world.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Sargent

customer_reviews.title: This product is the BEST!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have used it for a month now and we love this! We wished we had ordered it along time ago! This really works like it said it did!
customer_reviews.author: Keech

customer_reviews.title: No hassles
customer_reviews.text: Hassle free, tetherless, solar powered. Seems to work great, as we had and had *NO* algae problem this summer.
customer_reviews.author: MMI

customer_reviews.title: love the floatron
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Floatron. The first one lasted for 15 years. The first reorder had a leak and Amazon sent me another new one within 2 days. I love the product and would reccommend it for anyone who has a pool.
customer_reviews.author: Romanoville

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: It has been in my pool for over a month now. No algae. Just as others have indicated, I'm getting along with much less chlorine that usual.

customer_reviews.text: 2nd one i buy after my first stopped working after 5 years of daily use. Works as promised, reduces chemicals use and collects calcium

customer_reviews.text: The filter is easy to set up and is working great. Delivery was super fast! I received my purchase the very next day!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: a non-performer
customer_reviews.text: This has turned out to be a big disappointment. I'm not seeing any change in the condition of pool water. I'm not using any less chemicals. I am telling other consumers to be very skeptical if you are considering buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Louis P. Gallardo

customer_reviews.title: Broken upon opening flotron
customer_reviews.text: We bought one three years ago. The upkeep is difficult but it does what it says. It has been sinking now for 6 months so we ordered a new one. It was broken when we opened it. Could screw copper tube in because the base inside was stripped/not "fixed" securely and it wold just spin. I want another one but there was no quality control for this one.
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Only had to add abit of chlorine
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Only had to add abit of chlorine, all season!!

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Highly recommend to save on chemical usage

customer_reviews.author: TI

product_meta.title: floatron Original Solar Powered Water Purifier/Ionizer - Naturally Mineralized Pool Water
feature_bullets: COPPER IONIZATION - Pool, pond, and water feature cleaning kills algae with natural minerals when sunlight is converted to a harmless electrical current energizing an electrode
LOWER CHLORINE LEVELS - Reduce chemical usage up to 80% in above-ground, in-ground, chlorinated and saltwater pools
SOLAR POWERED - Environmentally friendly solar panels are low-maintenance and requires little attention, no expensive batteries or high electric bills
SAFE - Treat swimming pool while keeping your bathing suit from fading and bleaching, avoid redeye and don't worry about damaging or bleaching your hair Key Product Features
DURABLE PORTABILITY - Floating cordless water purifier has a solid state no moving parts design. Crystal clear swimming pool water naturally

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars280 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
